ItHasBeen: ^You look like you've been taking care of yourself, I'm happy to see that.
StopHimThere: ^I just want to say I'm sorry, I never meant to hurt you
^I'm sorry for what I did to you, I've been regretting it ever since...
Understanding: ^It really has been a long time you know...
^It stayed with me for a long while too but I've moved on from what happened.
^Seeing the changes you've made to your habits, you're not drinking uncontrollably, you're maintaining a respectable look and you're even helping others...
UnderstandingContinued: ^...I think you're already learning to move on Matt, I'm truely happy for you and how far you've come.
^I wish there was more I could do
ItsOkay: ^Things won't be the same as before but you've changed for the better, you should use this second chance to do right by others.
^If you can do that, it would be more than enough.
MovingOn: ^I should be going now, it's starting to get late.
^I wish you all the best, take care Mathew...
IKnow: ^But it doesn't change the fact that you *did* hurt me.
^I don't know if I can exactly "forgive" you for what happened but seeing your efforts to change yourself for the better, I have faith in you to move on.
IKnowContinued: ^We've been friends for a long time Mathew, while things will never be the same as before, I hope we can still be friends in the future.
HopeSoToo: ^I should be going now, it's getting late.
^It was nice to see you again, take care Matt.
GoingToCar: ^We've got work tomorrow, should probably head off, car's just around the corner.
